Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Weapon
  • public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a weapon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.Map<Color,​java.lang.Integer> buyCost
      Ammocubes needed to buy the weapon
      private int damageToDo
      Number of available ShootActions
      private java.lang.String description
      Short description of the weapon
      private boolean extraMoveToDo
      True if weapon effect can move his owner
      private java.util.List<Player> lastAddedTargetPlayers
      TargetPlayers that Shooter has selected in the last executed SelectTargetPlayerCommand
      private boolean loaded
      True if the weapon is loaded
      private static int MIN_SIZE
      Min size of targets
      private java.lang.String name
      Name of the weapon
      private java.util.Map<Color,​java.lang.Integer> reloadingCost
      Ammocubes needed to pay the reloading cost of the weapon
      private WeaponMode selectedWeaponMode
      Contains the currently selected weapon mode
      private java.util.List<Player> targetPlayers
      TargetPlayers that Shooter has selected
      private java.util.List<Square> targetSquares
      TargetSquares that Shooter has selected
      private java.util.List<WeaponMode> weaponModes
      Contains all the different fire mods of the weapon

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addTargetPlayer​(Player targetPlayer)
      This method adds a target player to the target list
      void addTargetSquare​(Square targetSquare)
      This method adds a target square to the target list
      private ShootCommand createShootCommandGetDamageZero​(Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      Create a ShootCommand with all target players (same damage to everyone getDamage(0), no moves)
      private java.util.List<EffectCommand> createSimpleEffectCommandList​(Player shooter)
      Creates an EffectCommand for each target player (no moves)
      private ShootCommand createSimpleShootCommand​(Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      Creates a ShootCommand with all target players (no moves)
      (package private) void deselectWeaponMode()
      This method removes the selected weapon mode and sets it to null
      void deselectWeaponMode​(WeaponMode weaponMode)
      This method removes the selected weapon mode and sets it to null
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      This method returns the weapon's description
      java.lang.String getName()
      This method returns the weapon's name
      java.util.List<Command> getPossibleCommands​(GameBoard gameboard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possible commands to execute (ExtraMoveCommands MoveCommand, SelectTargetsCommands SelectTargetPlayerCommand SelectTargetSquareCommand, ShootCommands ShootCommand)
      private java.util.List<MoveCommand> getPossibleExtraMoveCommands​(GameBoard gameBoard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possibles ExtraMoveCommands ( MoveCommands generated by weapon effect )
      private java.util.List<WeaponCommand> getPossibleSelectTargetCommands​(GameBoard gameboard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possible SelectTargetsCommands (SelectTargetPlayerCommand SelectTargetSquareCommand)
      private java.util.List<WeaponCommand> getPossibleSelectTargetCommandsMultiTarget​(GameBoard gameboard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possible SelectTargetsCommands (SelectTargetPlayerCommand SelectTargetSquareCommand) generated by WeaponModes that need to target a square and a player simultaneously
      private java.util.List<WeaponCommand> getPossibleSelectTargetCommandsTargetCanMoveBeforeShoot​(GameBoard gameboard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possible SelectTargetsCommands (SelectTargetPlayerCommand SelectTargetSquareCommand) generated by WeaponModes that can move a target before the actual shooting action
      private java.util.List<WeaponCommand> getPossibleSelectTargetCommandsTargetPlayers​(GameBoard gameboard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possible SelectTargetsCommands (SelectTargetPlayerCommand SelectTargetSquareCommand) generated by WeaponModes that need to target a Player
      private java.util.List<WeaponCommand> getPossibleSelectTargetCommandsTargetPlayersCardinalDirection​(GameBoard gameboard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possible SelectTargetsCommands (SelectTargetPlayerCommand SelectTargetSquareCommand) generated by WeaponModes whose WeaponMode.isCardinalDirectionMode()L returns true
      private java.util.List<WeaponCommand> getPossibleSelectTargetCommandsTargetPlayersNotVisible​(GameBoard gameboard, Player shooter, ReadyToShootState state)
      This method returns the possible SelectTargetsCommands (SelectTargetPlayerCommand SelectTargetSquareCommand) generated by WeaponModes whose WeaponMode.isTargetVisibleByShooter() returns false

      This method returns the weapon's reloading cost
      WeaponMode getSelectedWeaponMode()
      This method returns the current selected weapon mode
      java.util.List<SelectWeaponModeCommand> getSelectWeaponModeCommands​(Player player, ChoosingWeaponOptionState state)
      This method returns the commands to select which weapon mode to use.
      java.util.Map<Color,​java.lang.Integer> getWeaponBuyCost()
      This method returns the weapon's buy cost
      java.util.List<WeaponMode> getWeaponModes()
      This method returns all weapon mods
      boolean hasDamageToDo()
      This method returns true if the weapon can shoot again
      boolean hasExtraMove()
      This method returns true if the weapon can generate MoveCommands when invoked
      private boolean hasNotMaximumTargets()
      Returns true if player has not selected the max number of targets
      private boolean hasSufficientTargets()
      Returns true if player has selected the minimum number of targets
      boolean isLoaded()
      This method returns true if the weapon is loaded
      private boolean isSelectingTargets()
      This method returns true if a target square or a player has been selected
      void postDeserialization()
      Must be called to instantiate some fields which are not saved on json
      void reload()
      This method reloads the weapon
      void removeTargetPlayer​(Player targetPlayer)
      This method removes the player from the target list
      void removeTargetSquare​(Square targetSquare)
      This method removes the square from the targets list
      void resetMoves()
      This method resets the extraMoves
      private void resetTargetLists()
      Resets targets
      void setSelectedWeaponMode​(WeaponMode selectedWeaponMode)
      This method sets the weapon mode
      void shoot()
      This method must be called when executing a ShootCommand
      void unload()
      This method unloads the weapon
      void useExtraMoves()
      This method marks that extra moves have been used

      • hasNotMaximumTargets

        private boolean hasNotMaximumTargets()
        Returns true if player has not selected the max number of targets
        Returns:
        true if player has not selected the max number of targets

      • hasSufficientTargets

        private boolean hasSufficientTargets()
        Returns true if player has selected the minimum number of targets
        Returns:
        true if player has selected the minimum number of targets

      • getSelectWeaponModeCommands

        public java.util.List<SelectWeaponModeCommand> getSelectWeaponModeCommands​(Player player,
                                                                           ChoosingWeaponOptionState state)
        This method returns the commands to select which weapon mode to use.
        Parameters:
        player - Player who is using the weapon
        state - Shooter's state
        Returns:
        List of commands to select a weapon mode.

      • addTargetPlayer

        public void addTargetPlayer​(Player targetPlayer)
        This method adds a target player to the target list
        Parameters:
        targetPlayer - player to be added

      • addTargetSquare

        Parameters:
        targetSquare - Square to be added

      • removeTargetPlayer

        This method removes the player from the target list
        Parameters:
        targetPlayer - Player to be removed

      • removeTargetSquare

        public void removeTargetSquare​(Square targetSquare)
        This method removes the square from the targets list
        Parameters:
        targetSquare - Square to be removed
